main event: A round white object with a red tail was observed moving slowly in Marlboro, N.J. on February 6, 1960.
interesting points: The observation lasted for about 15 minutes,The object was described as being about the size of a big street light,The object moved in a straight course before disappearing, The report indicated insufficient information for further evaluation, The observation was part of the U.S. Air Force's Project Blue Book.
sighted object: round white object with a red tail
witness description: Insufficient information provided regarding the witness.
